options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationServicePortName) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationServicePortName) AS pair
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642193285) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642195085)
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(octetDeltaCount) as bytes, sourcePodName as source, destinationServicePortName as destination
From flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
GROUP BY source, destination

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationServicePortName) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount), (sourcePodName, destinationServicePortName) AS pair
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642193431) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642195231)
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount) as bytes, sourcePodName as source, destinationServicePortName as destination
From flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
GROUP BY source, destination

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) as time, CONCAT(sourcePodName, '->', destinationServicePortName) as pair, SUM(throughput) as Pod
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndSeconds)
GROUP BY time, pair
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(flowEndSeconds) as time, CONCAT(sourcePodName, '->', destinationServicePortName) as pair, SUM(reverseThroughput) as Pod
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time, pair
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode) as time, sourcePodName, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode) as Pod
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time, sourcePodName
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), sourcePodName
FROM default.flows_pod_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642532448) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642534248) 
AND flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY sourcePodName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT $__timeInterval(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode) as time, destinationServicePortName, SUM(throughputFromDestinationNode) as Service
FROM flows_pod_view
WHERE flowType IN (1, 2)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationPodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND destinationServicePortName != ''
AND $__timeFilter(time)
GROUP BY time, destinationServicePortName
ORDER BY time
